org.robolectric.shadows
Class ShadowPaint

java.lang.Object
  org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowPaint
Direct Known Subclasses:
ShadowTextPaint
@Implements(value=android.graphics.Paint.class)
public class ShadowPaint
extends Object

Shadow of Paint that has some extra accessors so that tests can tell whether a Paint object was created with the expected parameters.
